concept.title: Drawing Recovery
concept.shortdesc: Once terminated by hardware problems, power failure or software problems, the application is capable of backup the opened drawing file. At the next startup, the programstarts "Drawing Recovery" manager in which all of the auto-backup drawing files that have been closed accidentally will be displayed. You can open the file of your demand by double-clicking at the Backup File list on the "Drawing Recovery" if there is any damage to the file, the systemattempts to recover the drawing in process of backup.

conbody.p: When program or system stopped by accident, the drawing files need to recover are sorted into the following types.

ul.li: Recovered drawing file saved when the programfails (DWG)
